metadata.dc:author: Hernández-Siverio, N
Méndez-Medina, R
González-Platas, M
Díaz-Flores, L
González-Hermoso, F
metadata.dc:description: Experimental study about suture materials of mean velocity absorption, in order to demonstrate their capacity to obtain a correct and sure arterial cicatrization by means of their tensile force, even though they disappear afterwards by absorption. 32 arterial anastomosis were carry out, and all of them resisted 300 mmHg of pressure, without to be broken.
metadata.dc:title: Estudio biofísico de la resistencia de anastomosis arteriales. Resultados experimentales.
[Biophysical study of resistance in arterial anastomoses. Experimental results].
